title: Hex Crafting bug
body:
Hello Riot,

Just wanted to let you guys know there is a glitch when coming out of a game and you go into hextech crafting the client will close out completely and you have to log back in to get the hextech to work properly.  This only happens when you get out from playing a game,  If for example, you go straight into the crafting it is find and works properly.  Just wanted to let you know about that if did not know about it already.

Thanks
Shackmanpro

replies.body:
Hey shackmanpro -

Thanks for the report! The team's aware of the issue, and they're in the process of figuring out what's causing the issue. Sorry for the inconvenience! D:

Thanks for the comment back you guys are awesome.  Hope there is a fix soon to this. Thanks again.

Shackmanpro
